eidolon.codex.page.arcane_gold.title: Redstone Gold
eidolon.codex.page.arcane_gold: It is possible to alchemically imbue gold with a small amount of magical energy. The resulting metal is stronger and more magically conductive than mundane gold, and is put to good use in the construction of magic items.
eidolon.codex.page.inlays: Metal inlay is a simple method for durably inscribing sigils and symbols into magical constructs. While mundane on their own, inlays of pewter and redstone gold appear frequently in magical formulae.
